thread.section_title: Shop4Seats Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Shop4Seats | shop4seats.com
thread.title: Jacke Spencer

author: Jacke Spencer
title: Jacke Spencer
text:
I had some questions regarding how the bed mechanism moved when reclining, also fabric & added 5 year warranty questions. Alec was able to get quick answers that were enough to help me in my decisions. I look forward to seeing the finished product!
I expect nothing less than an excellent sofa bed... same as the excellent service I received when placing the order with Alec.
Thanks,
Jacke S.
